Player History
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/5/1986 to a 2-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 5/14/1988, off Steve Crawford (SD)...
Traded from Cincinnati to Atlanta on 6/1/1988 (Going to CIN: C Ivan Rodriguez. Going to ATL: P Jeff Montgomery, P Curt Schilling, 1B Hal Morris)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/5/1990, off Roger Clemens (LAD)...
2/2/1993: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,157,143 through salary arbitration...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Philadelphia on 4/13/1993...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 4/25/1993...
